title: GT Voice: Inbound tourism boom offers opportunities, not risk, for yuan
summary: The inbound tourism boom in China offers opportunities for the yuan's internationalization. As more foreign tourists visit China, the use of yuan in cross-border transactions is expected to increase, strengthening the currency's global position.
insight: 持续监测相关动态，及时调整营销策略。

title: 韩国民众赴华旅游热度持续升温
summary: 2025年前往中国大陆的韩国游客约316万人次，较2024年增加36.9%。中国对韩国持普通护照人员试行免签政策一年多来，韩国民众赴华旅游意愿持续走高。
insight: 签证便利化有利于提升中国游客赴美意愿，夏威夷可加大签证辅助服务宣传。
